description: This file sets up a reasoning agent using OpenAI's GPT-4 model to discuss the philosophical concept of 'The Ship of Theseus'. It defines a task and invokes the agent to generate a response with reasoning displayed.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: A class representing an AI agent capable of processing tasks and generating responses.

methods.name: print_response
methods.description: Method to generate and display the agent's response to a given task, with options for streaming and showing full reasoning.
